title: Top Places to visit in Kishtwar, Jammu and Kashmir
content:
Kishtwar is a municipality in the Kishtwar District of the Jammu region in the Indian state of Jammu and Kashmir.
Kishtwar District is a district of the state of Jammu and Kashmir of India. As of 2011, it is the third least populous district of Jammu and Kashmir (out of 22), after Kargil

title: Top Places to visit in Kathua, Jammu and Kashmir
content: Kathua, is a town and Municipal Council in the Indian state of Jammu and Kashmir, near its southern border with Punjab and Himachal Pradesh. title: Top Places to visit in Kargil, Jammu and Kashmir
content: Kargil is a town in the Kargil district in the Ladakh region of northern India. It is the second largest town in Ladakh after Leh. It is located 60 km and 204 km from Drass and Srinagar to the west respectively, 234 km from Leh to the east, 240 km from Padum to the southeast and 1,047 km from Del

title: Top Places to visit in Jammu, Jammu and Kashmir
content: Jammu is the winter capital and the largest city in Jammu district of the Indian state of Jammu and Kashmir. title: Top Places to visit in Ganderbal, Jammu and Kashmir
content: Ganderbal is a town and a municipality committee in Ganderbal district in the Indian Union Territory of Jammu and Kashmir. It has an average elevation of 1,619 metres (5,312 feet). Top Places to visit in Bandipora, Bandipore, Jammu and Kashmir
content: Bandipora or Bandipora is the headquarters of district of Bandipore in the state of Jammu and Kashmir, India. title: Top Places to visit in Anantnag, Jammu and Kashmir
content: Anantnag  is a city and a municipality, capital of the Anantnag district in the Indian state of Jammu and Kashmir.
